column1: Table 6. Nonfatal firearm and nonfirearm violence, by victim-offender relationship, 2007–2011
Data source: National Crime Victimization Survey, 2007-2011
Authors: Michael Planty and Jennifer Truman
Table 6. Nonfatal firearm and nonfirearm violence, by victim-offender relationship, 2007–2011
Note: Detail may not sum to total due to rounding. See appendix table 17 for standard errors.
a/Includes current or former spouses, boyfriends, or girlfriends.
b/Includes relationships unknown and number of offenders unknown.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 2007–2011.
